review: This works exactly as advertised and I love it. I use it on my Mac to watch live sports and have realized that I can have the game up on the Chromecast and still use my laptop at the same time. Occasionally the Chromecast will lag and then drop the connection, but it only takes a minute to reload.
author: Amazon Customer

review: Fabulous! I love it! I almost purchased an HDMI cord to use with my Nook for like $45 when I stumbled across the Chromecast, quite by accident. No wires, you can stream from the tablet, phone OR laptop, you do NOT have to watch on the device whatever you are casting to the TV (you could play a game while casting Netflix or Youtube), AND it was $10 cheaper!! Apparently, a lot of improvements and developments are underway as well, so I can only expect things to get even better-BONUS!!Highly recommend!!
